===== IATI Activities =====

==== Example Usage ====
Example that uses version 1.02, and was generated on 29th June 2013:
<code xml>
    <iati-activities version="1.02" generated-datetime="2012-06-29T00:00:00">
       ....
    </iati-activities>
</code>
